amendment.description: An amendment numbered 282 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to increase the existing set aside of $15M for planning, preparation, or design of transit, transit-oriented development, and multimodal projects funds to $20M.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garcia (IL) amendment (A093) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Garcia (IL) amendment (A093) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A093) offered by Mr. Garcia (IL).
